originalText.text: Absolutely loved my experience with Dr Gartner. Having being uncertain about my decision to get breast augmentation procedure done for years, I was immediately convinced after my consultation with Dr Gartner. An absolute plus that he is an expert in the "awake" surgery. Had an amazing experience and an even more amazing result!

text.text: Absolutely loved my experience with Dr Gartner. Having being uncertain about my decision to get breast augmentation procedure done for years, I was immediately convinced after my consultation with Dr Gartner. An absolute plus that he is an expert in the "awake" surgery. Had an amazing experience and an even more amazing result!

originalText.text:
After having a child a few years ago and undergoing the body-altering effects of pregnancy, I was considering having a breast augmentation with a lift. But obviously I was nervous about the thought of starting this journey. Fortunately for me, I have a friend who referred me to Dr. Gartner, and knew first-hand of his artistry in plastic surgery.

I initially called the office, and my first impression was one that has stuck with me throughout the experience. The staff was very professional, courteous and patient in helping me schedule my first visit and follow-up appointments. When I met Dr. Gartner, I was immediately put at ease and felt that I had found my plastic surgeon on the first attempt. I instantly felt comfortable with Dr. Gartner who took the time to answer all of my questions thoroughly, professionally and provided me with realistic goals.

Fast forward to the day of the surgery, I was scheduled to undergo a breast lift with breast implants. The surgery was performed successfully and I was ecstatic about my breasts. I was amazed at the minimum amount of pain I endured the very first night post-surgery and was walking around a couple of hours later.

On my very first post-op appointment, I could already see the wonderful job he had done. I could not stop smiling and saying how much I love the way they turned out. I’m currently a year and a half post-surgery and to say that I love my breast is an understatement. Needless to say, I highly recommend Dr. Gartner to anyone that is considering plastic surgery.

originalText.text: Dr. Gartner is extremely talented and professional. I had a breast augmentation performed. He explained everything to me each step of the way and truly listened to my desired outcomes. His staff is friendly and professional as well. You're in great hands if you go with Dr. G!

text.text: Dr. Gartner is extremely talented and professional. I had a breast augmentation performed. He explained everything to me each step of the way and truly listened to my desired outcomes. His staff is friendly and professional as well. You're in great hands if you go with Dr. G!

originalText.text:
I haven’t stopped singing praises about the care that I received at Doctor Gartner’s Tri-State Surgery Center.  From my initial consultation to the day of surgery Doctor Gartner and his staff were always professional.  The day of surgery can be filled with anxiety.  However, from the moment I arrived the nurse was the epitome of a caring, empathetic, professional.  She made me feel safe, welcomed and comfortable she answered my questions and provided support.   I always suspected Dr. Gartner, was passionate about his work “the art of cosmetic surgery” However, on the day of my surgery this was confirmed.  Dr. Gartner explained the surgical process which included, marking the surgical sites, expected length of the surgery and called me later that evening to check on me.    I’d recommend him to everyone.  His attention to detail assured me that not only did I choose  the perfect doctor but that he is touched by God.  His work is amazing!  Dr. Phillips the (anesthesiologist) treated me as his number one priority, he explained his process and he even played Andrea Bocelli’s The Pray.......what can be better than that!  Paula T, my patient consultant has always been my gem! Her number one virtue is patience.  Paula provided education about various payment methods, ordering the compression garments needed post surgery and most importantly she provided support and always answered questions timely and efficiently.   I’m honored to have found Dr. Gartner and his PHENOMENAL TEAM.
If you are considering plastic surgery....your search should END HERE! Make your appointment, schedule your procedure and be prepared to be extremely pleased.

MCL

originalText.text: Doctor Gartner is the best! He gives so much care that you get out of surgery with NO brusing And very clean. Healing was fast for me. I feel Great and the results are amazing, like I never went in for surgery.
